entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Apsley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:47 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 03:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
Temperature: -5.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.6°C
Wind: ENE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
